segments.text: Last week , we had a performance review on all the staff in our department in last quarter . Stevens , can you provide more information about the performance review ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir . Most of us had positive review in last quarter . Take Fred and David for examples . Both of them try their best to achieve the best . Their progress is distinct , especially in last quarter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They are popular in and out of our department . Fred is easygoing , while David is cautious in working .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All these say a lot for their characters .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , I want to recommend them for a raise . Fred is promoted to be the assistant of manager in marketing department and David to be director of office .
segments.speaker: S1
